name: Dania Sauce
keywords: fall, garlic, red pepper flakes, tomato, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds tomatoes, peeled, seeded and diced
3 small dried hot red peppers, minced
1/4 cup grated Parmigiano Reggiano and Pecorino cheese, mixed

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan combine all the ingredients, and cook over a medium flame for 30 minutes. Serve over pasta or with a roast.
